1789 di ewaka pawathi maha brithanya palakayan wisin andaman dupath ashrithawa nawika hamuda kandawurak nirmanaya karana ladi.mein wasara dekakata pasu maha andaman dupathe pawathi nawuka kandawura ema dupathe ginikona desata genayana ladi.kese wethath mema awadhiyedi andaman nawika hamuda kandawure siti boho nawuka bhatayan rogawalata goduruwi miyagiyayeya.[8]
